articles.author: Variety
articles.title: Ava DuVernay makes history as First Black woman to have film compete in Venice Film Festival - NBC News
articles.description: Ava DuVernay is making history as the first Black American woman in the Venice Film Festival’s 80-year existence to have a film compete for the Golden Lion.
articles.content: At the Venice Film Festival press conference for Ava DuVernays new film Origin on Wednesday, the director revealed that she has previously been told not to apply to the festival because you wont get … [+2705 chars]
